reviewText: i don't like buying things before i've seen at least some part of them, but i bout thins one on the off chance it was good and its more then good its great! its a bunch of scenes put together as if they are taken out of a larger movie, so while there is a story line you are not told what it is, nor are you meant to know. aside from the fact that most of the girls say "no" (which is super awkward) these scenes are great. utilizing camera angles and positions that are not really an option helps lend to the excitement of seeing something new. this is my new favorite. it cuts to all the good stuff and is still really long,
